### **Factors**

In this section you can factor the selected columns of the *dataset*, this factorization consists of transforming the column values into 'levels' depending on their value, this factorization is important in columns that have repeated values such as the gender of a patient, for example . In the next section you can view the *dataset* with the changes made during this menu. In the following menu **Variables Definition**, the process of building the GEE model will start with the definition of the variables of interest.
